definition: A large motor vehicle designed to transport a significant number of passengers, typically along scheduled routes, often equipped with seating and standing areas. It is commonly used for public transportation purposes, such as commuting, city tours, and long-distance travel.

examples.german: Der Bus fährt um 8 Uhr ab.
Ich nehme immer den Bus zur Arbeit.
examples.english: I always take the bus to work.
The bus driver was very friendly.

examples.german: Der Bus hält an der nächsten Haltestelle.
examples.english: The bus stops at the next bus stop.
